entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 02:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -7.2°C
Wind: ENE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets overnight. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets changing to periods of drizzle in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
